source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SEQ_00<tab>You sense that Gerolt is excited to see you back in Hyrstmill.
target: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SEQ_00<tab>ハーストミルのゲロルトは、「ゾディアックウェポン」の再創造を進めたいようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SEQ_01<tab>Now that you have gathered the necessary pieces, Gerolt reveals the identity of his secret materia: your relic weapon nexus. Indeed, he reasons, if all the combined energies bound to the weapon could be made into materia, the very souls you have worked so hard to cultivate can ascend to the new host. But whether such an outrageous thing is even possible remains to be seen. To find out, Gerolt bids you seek the counsel of Master Mutamix at the Bonfire.
target: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SEQ_01<tab>ハーストミルのゲロルトによると、再創造する「ゾディアックウェポン」には、「古の武器」をマテリアにしたものが必要だという。中央ザナラーンの狼煙の丘にいる「ミュタミクス」に協力を要請しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SEQ_02<tab>Mutamix readily agrees to lend his aid to your cause. Inform Gerolt that the materia master is ready and willing.
target: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SEQ_02<tab>ミュタミクスは、協力について快諾してくれた。ハーストミルの「ゲロルト」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SEQ_03<tab>Delighted that Master Mutamix has promised to help, Gerolt now says everything is in place. Speak with Jalzahn when you are ready to recreate your Zodiac Weapon.
target: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SEQ_03<tab>ゲロルトは、ミュタミクスの協力を喜んでいるようだ。準備が整ったら、ハーストミルのジャルザーンに話しかけ、「ゾディアックウェポン」を再創造しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Mutamix Bubblypots at the Bonfire.
target: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_TODO_00<tab>狼煙の丘のミュタミクスと話す
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_TODO_01<tab>ハーストミルのゲロルトと話す

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_000<tab>So ye've found all four bits an' pieces, eh? How do I know? Hah, it's written all over yer smug face.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_000……チッ、その顔、やり遂げたようじゃねぇか……。
相変わらずテメェは仕事が早いな……。
集めた「4つの素材」は、再創造の時まで、捨てるんじゃねーぞ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_JALZAHN_000_001<tab>Does Gerolt speak true, my friend? You have acquired <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> the items? Huzzah! Come, <var 08 E905 ((my friends)) ((gentlemen)) /var>, let us recreate an arm of yore!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_JALZAHN_000_001)) (( )) 02 /var>が、すべての材料を集めたか！
素晴らしい……さっそく「ゾディアックウェポン」の製作を！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_002<tab>We ain't there jus' yet, Jalzahn. Aye, I can forge a host with the raw materials what <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> brought quick as ye please. But all we'll have then is a fancy weapon without the essence of a legendary arm.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_002焦ってるンじゃねーよ、ジジイ。
こいつが集めた素材で作ることが出来るのは、
あくまで「ゾディアックウェポン」の形を模した「器」だ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_003<tab>We've still got to join it with special materia. By my reckonin', it's the only way to infuse our new host with the power o' souls.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_003前に言っただろうがよ。
武器に「魂」を込めるには「特殊なマテリア」を使うとな。

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_JALZAHN_000_004<tab>How do you propose we fashion this materia? Should <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> gather ten pieces of each form of atma? No, mayhap...twenty? Fifty? Surely materia composed of fifty pieces would be sufficient.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_JALZAHN_000_004……そういえば、そのマテリアはどう作るのだ？
まさか、魂の欠片である「アートマ」を、集めてきてもらうのか？
今度は12種をそれぞれ10個ずつくらいにすれば……もしや！？

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_005<tab>What the hells're ye on about, old man? The answer's right in front o' yer eyes: the bleedin' relic itself!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_005もしや……じゃねぇよ、ジジイ！
そんなことをしなくても、目の前にあンだろう？
冒険者がこれまで集め、鍛え上げた「魂」が……よぉ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_006<tab>Aye, you an' <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> have done a fine job o' fillin' the thing up with soul energy as the ancients did. Jus' turn all that to materia, an' meld it with our new host─make the souls ascend into an arm o' legend!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_006そう……「古の武器・ネクサス」そのものだ！
こいつをマテリアにして「器」に流し込むってぇ寸法よ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_007<tab>'Tis an awful amount of energy to deal with, though. Yer average old craftsman would make a right mess o' me finest smithin', an' disperse the souls to boot. What we need is a real master o' materia─if ye catch me drift.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_007だが「古の武器」は元々、オレの作った最高傑作……。
そんじょそこらの奴にはマテリアにはできねぇ。
……それができるのは、マテリアの達人だけだ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_JALZAHN_000_008<tab>Master Mutamix─but of course! Who else but he could create such potent materia?
target: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_JALZAHN_000_008<tab>……そうか、マテリアの専門家であるミュタミクス氏か！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_JALZAHN_000_009<tab>Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you must go to the Bonfire and ask his aid at once! Surely he will not refuse the challenge.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_JALZAHN_000_009マテリアの技術をもたらした氏なら、可能かもしれん！
)) (( )) 02 /var>よ、狼煙の丘まで向かい、
ミュタミクス氏に協力を仰いでくれないか！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_JALZAHN_000_020<tab>I have never been so close to achieving my dreams... But long experience among failed experiments, however, teaches caution in such matters.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_JALZAHN_000_020「ゾディアックウェポン」の実現まで、
あと一歩……というところまで迫ってきたな！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_025<tab>I thought ye were off speakin' with Mutamix at the Bonfire about the arm o' legend?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_025狼煙の丘にいるミュタミクスじいさんに、
「古の武器」をマテリアにしてもらうよう、頼んできやがれ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>In order to receive the quest “His Dark Materia,” you must be equipped with a relic weapon nexus. Paladins must be equipped with both Curtana and the Holy Shield.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SYSTEM_000_000「古の武器・ネクサス」を装備していないと、
クエスト「眠れる大器」を開始することができません。
ジョブ「ナイト」は「剣」と「盾」を装備する必要があります。

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>In order to advance the quest “His Dark Materia,” you must be equipped with a relic weapon nexus. Paladins must be equipped with both Curtana and the Holy Shield.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_SYSTEM_000_001「古の武器・ネクサス」を装備していないと、
クエスト「眠れる大器」を進行することができません。
ジョブ「ナイト」は「剣」と「盾」を装備する必要があります。

source:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_050Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Hubairtin and Adkin trade many tongueflaps about sphere scrolls. But today, uplander seeks materia-knowings of Mutamix?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_050シュコォ……シュコォ……
おやおや　今日は　ごそうだん～？
すっごい武器を　マテリア　変えたい～？

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_051<tab>...Uplander wants to make legendary fighty-tool into materia? Interesting. Fighty-tool full of airyself become amazing materia... And with the knowings in Mutamix's braincase, it possible!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_051ふむふむ　なるほど　おもしろい～
すっごい武器なら　すっごいマテリア
きっと　きっと　できるぞな～！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_052<tab>But Mutamix has shivershakes. It is very big chance-game! Even with the knowings of Mutamix, cannot give wordbond of success. Braincase filled with doubtful buzzing muchly!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_052少し　ばかりの　心配は～？
やっぱり　気になる　成功率～！
わしでも　わからぬ　成功率～！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_053<tab>May go very, very unrightly! If Mutamix is failing, legendary fighty-tool will turn to bittybits! Airyself go bye-bye, too!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_053しっぱいしたら　たいへんだ～！
すっごい武器が　壊れちゃう～！
いどむも勇気　やめるも勇気～！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_054<tab>But will give hand-lending if uplander is unweak of bladder. Give hail-call, and Mutamix make trip to your stayplace.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_054準備ができたら　いつでも行くぞ
準備ができたら　呼んどくれ～！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_070<tab>When uplander makes up braincase, give hail-call. Mutamix will make trip to your stayplace.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_MUTAMIX_000_070準備ができたら　いつでも行くぞ
準備ができたら　呼んどくれ～！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_100<tab>An' what did Mutamix have to say? ...Hah! I knew he couldn't say no to a challenge like this!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_100そうか、協力すると言っていたか。
ミュタミクスじいさんなら、やってくれると思ったぜ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_101<tab>An' that...that means that everything's set fer the great show! I've got me forge fired up, so all that's left is to tell Jalzahn yer ready an' willin'.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_101こっちは準備万端、発射オーライだ！
テメェの準備が整ったら、向こうのジジイに声をかけやがれ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_102<tab>Well, me adventurin' friend, what say we recreate us a legendary arm? Ahahaha!
target: TEXT_JOBREL015_00361_GEROLT_000_102<tab>「ゾディアックウェポン」の再創造……いよいよ決行だ！
